channel.title: [PI] Making claws hit 4 times
channel.description:
How do I make dragon claws hit 4 times?
it hits twice, two like 40 and 30, or random specs, then the side two hit 0?
Help would be much appreciated.

item.title: [PI] Making claws hit 4 times
item.dc:creator: @monkey_money30 monkey money30
item.description:
@monkey_money30 wrote:

the case is already there… so theres something wrong

case 11777: // Dragon claws c.startAnimation(3994); c.doubleHit = true; c.usingClaws = true; c.specAccuracy = 2.40; c.specDamage = 1.40; c.specEffect = 5; c.hitDelay = getHitDelay(c.getItems().getItemName(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]).toLowerCase()); break;

thats the case…

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Making claws hit 4 times
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

In Combatassistant.java

find the public void activateSpecial

and in that void, there should be a switch statement(weapon)

in that switch statement find the case for the dragon claws special,

and paste that here.

Read full topic
